name: Donald W. MARVIN, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of July 2006, we hereby AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

902 A.2d 509
